name: Electrical Luna

trigger.text: Rest up to one of your opponent's characters.

text: Main All of your opponent's rested characters with a cost of 7 or less do not become active during your opponent's next refresh phase.

effect.text: All of your opponent's rested characters with a cost of 7 or less do not become active during your opponent's next refresh phase.
Rest up to one of your opponent's characters.
